title: 2.5 Trojan Horse
description:
Prisoner release, the twin brother’s connections, a whistle-blower.

Visit passengerlist.org to see a script and full list of credits for “Trojan Horse,” and join the investigation.

Passenger List Season 2 was created and directed by John Scott Dryden; sound designed by Steve Bond; with music by Mark Henry Phillips. “Trojan Horse” was written by Janina Matthewson. Passenger List is a proud member of Radiotopia, from PRX.

KAITLIN – Kelly Marie Tran
RORY – Ben Daniels
PROFESSOR ALCOTTE – Cyril Nri
MARIANNE – Carlyss Peer
CONOR – Akie Kotabe
NADJULA - Munirih Grace
HARRIS -  Kerry Shale
AGENT MURPHY- Danielle Lewis

OTHER VOICES:
Laurel Lefkow, Christopher Ragland, Eric Meyers, Gianna Kiehl, Eric Sirakian, Chris Kelly, Maddy Kelly, Merk Nguyen
itunes:subtitle: Prisoner release, the twin brother’s connections, a whistle-blower.
